actions.committee: Senate Committee on Labor and Public Welfare
actions.text: Referred to Senate Committee on Labor and Public Welfare.

official_title: A bill to amend the National Labor Relations Act to achieve its aims and objectives.

summary.text: Provides, under the National Labor Relations Act, that representation and decertification petitions before the National Labor Relations Board shall not be dismissed or delayed in processing solely because an unfair labor practice charge has been filed.

titles.title: A bill to amend the National Labor Relations Act to achieve its aims and objectives.
